ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 132 SMs x 128 CUDA cores/SM x 2 (FMA) / 2 = 16,896 FP64 ops/clock (estimated dual-die)
ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 132 SMs x 128 CUDA cores/SM x 2 (FMA) = 33,792 FP32 ops/clock (estimated per die)
ops_per_clock_notes.tf32: 132 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 1024 ops/TC/clock = 540,672 TF32 ops/clock (5th gen, 2x H100)
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 132 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 2048 ops/TC/clock = 1,081,344 FP16 ops/clock (5th gen TC)
ops_per_clock_notes.fp8: 132 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 4096 ops/TC/clock = 2,162,688 FP8 ops/clock (5th gen TC)
ops_per_clock_notes.fp4: 132 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 8192 ops/TC/clock = 4,325,376 FP4 ops/clock (Blackwell exclusive)
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 132 SMs x 4 Tensor Cores/SM x 4096 ops/TC/clock = 2,162,688 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (2100 MHz estimated). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks. Specs are estimates pending official disclosure.
notes: Blackwell architecture (2024). 5th gen Tensor Cores with FP4/FP6 support. Dual GB100 dies with 10 TB/s NV-HBI interconnect. 192GB HBM3e at 8 TB/s. First with FP4/FP6 precisions. 208B transistors on TSMC 4NP.
